description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows storage elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-38248):

1. Download and apply the KB5043080, KB5043076, KB5043067, or KB5043064 updates from the official Windows Update catalog.
2. Ensure the installation is complete and reboot your system if prompted to finalize the changes.

**Details**:
- These updates contain patches to mitigate the 'Use After Free' vulnerability in the Windows storage system.
- Specific builds impacted include:
  - Windows 11 Version 24H2: 10.0.26100.1742 (KB5043080)
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2: 10.0.22631.4169 (KB5043076)
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2: 10.0.19045.4894 (KB5043064)
- Update package URLs for manual installation:
  - [KB5043067](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043067)
  - [KB5043076](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043076)
  - [KB5043080](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043080)
  - [KB5043064](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043064)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is one of the supported versions listed above.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
